title.rendered: We can easily go anywhere with him now…

content.rendered:
Fluent Dog Training has been life changing for us!


We could not walk more than 1 block away from our house without our dog going crazy and out of control. I had tried everything I read/watched online but nothing really worked. I interviewed many trainers before starting the training with Carla. It has not even been 3 months yet but we already see huge changes in our relationship with our dog and the way he behaves. We can easily go anywhere with him now. we see good changes and progress on a weekly basis!! we’ve even been able to take him on a camping trip with zero issues.

Carla is extremely knowledgeable and can understand dog behavior very well and its obvious she LOVES dogs.

I am extremely happy with my decision. I HIGHLY recommend FluentDog Training.
